long_description: The Tern Link Uno folding bike is a quick-folding, agile-handling, all-arounding single-speed ride that's well-suited to exploring boroughs and towns. Capable of folding in under 10 seconds, the Link Uno is a study in simplicity and ease; folded dimensions are 31.1 x 28.3 x 14.1 in. Strong 6061 aluminum frame is designed to minimize flex and deliver a stiff, responsive platform for efficient transfer of your pedaling energy. OCL Joint frame hinge provides a strong, stiff frame joint that offers smooth, easy operation; large, smooth lever automatically locks into place. When frame is folded in half, the frame hinge surfaces lock together for a secure fit; lever folds flat and braces against joint for protection in transit. For confident handling, the Physis folding handlepost features a beefed-up, oversize hinge with machined surfaces and secure lock to minimize flexy play. Handlepost hinge lever automatically locks in place and is easy to use; if hinge is accidentally left unlocked, hinge won't open when handlebar is pushed forward. Also, the handlepost hinge features 3 rubber seals to keep weather out and the headset protected; redundant double bolts clamp handlepost to steerer. Single-speed drivetrain is the ultimate in low-maintenance and urban utility, taking away the fuss of cable adjustment and shifting. Chain features a continuous enclosure to keep clothing protected from grease and road gime. Rear coaster brake engages at the hub when one backpedals. Schwalbe Citizen tires feature double-layer puncture protection to deter flats. Accommodates riders up to 6 ft. 2 in. tall; recommended maximum weight of rider with gear is 243 lbs. Specs on the Tern Link Uno folding bike are subject to change.
